version_description:
• Fixed: Tapping support section in settings does not work. I formally apologize for that longterm mistake.
• Improved: iOS 9 compatibility

If you discover any issues during or after the update, please contact me at support@madefm.com or @madeFM on Twitter.

If you like MinuteTaker and have a minute, please leave a short review. This really helps a lot to!

• Fixed: Images are not attached to a PDF file.
• Fixed: Merging two identical minutes result in a wrong ordering/grouping of their action items.

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@madefm.com.

• New: Create a full copies of your minutes.
• New: Create a reminders of action items in the iOS Reminders app.

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Improved: Various improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Fix: Rarely failures when deleting workbooks
• Minor improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Minor improvements and fixes

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Fix a crash under iOS 11 when taking photos with the camera

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Improved: The address book list now shows all emails (work, home, ...) of a person
• Improved: Dramatically reduced the size of the generated PDF file when images are attached

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Fixed: Crash when editing participants of a meeting or assigning an owner to an action item
• Fixed: Some localisation issues.

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.

• Various fixes and improvements

If you discover any issues during or after the update please contact me at feedback@systemweit.de.
